Description: Spacious 3 BR/3 BA apartment in Allston. Just steps from the T. Perfect for both students and commuters. Walking distance to shopping, restaurants and more! Closest bus stop: 57 Brighton Ave Available: 09/01/2023 Each unit has central AC, hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and in unit free laundry. Energy efficient heating / cooling systems and a 5 star home energy rating on both units.
